Framework.Implementations
Class DisplayObject

java.lang.Object
  Framework.Implementations.DisplayObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDisplayObject
public class DisplayObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplayObject

The DisplayObject contains all the data for displaying something by a Core instance.

Version:
0.6
Author:
(Marc Price)

Constructor for objects of class DisplayObject

Parameters:
model - the path to the file for the model
tex - the path to the file for the texture
